GBM process simulation

Source: R/simGBM.R
simGBM.Rd

Simulates a Geometric Brownian Motion process

simGBM(
  nsims = 1,
  S0 = 10,
  drift = 0,
  sigma = 0.2,
  T2M = 1,
  dt = 1/12,
  vec = TRUE
)

Arguments

nsims

number of simulations. Defaults to 1

S0

Spot price at t=0

drift

Drift term in percentage

sigma

Standard deviation

T2M

Maturity in years

dt

Time step in period e.g. 1/250 = 1 business day.

vec

Vectorized implementation. Defaults to TRUE

Value

A tibble of simulated values

Author

Philippe Cote

Examples

simGBM(nsims = 2, S0 = 10, drift = 0, sigma = 0.2, T2M = 1, dt = 1 / 12, vec = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 13 × 3
#>         t  sim1  sim2
#>     <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 0       10    10  
#>  2 0.0833  10.2  10.7
#>  3 0.167   10.9  11.0
#>  4 0.25    11.2  11.1
#>  5 0.333   10.2  12.2
#>  6 0.417   10.1  10.9
#>  7 0.5     11.2  10.2
#>  8 0.583   11.9  10.8
#>  9 0.667   12.5  10.2
#> 10 0.75    13.1  10.8
#> 11 0.833   15.3  10.1
#> 12 0.917   15.5  10.8
#> 13 1       13.8  10.8
